starlight-no-reviews: Message shown when a page has no reviews yet
starlight-no-ratings: Message shown in summary when no ratings exist
starlight-review-count:
Shows the number of reviews. Parameters:
* $1 - number of reviews
starlight-rating-aria:
ARIA label for star rating display. Parameters:
* $1 - the rating value
starlight-rating-select:
ARIA label for clickable star in rating input. Parameters:
* $1 - star number
starlight-star-label: Label for 'star' unit in rating display
starlight-form-name: Label for reviewer name input field
starlight-form-save-name: Checkbox label for saving name for future reviews
starlight-form-remember-me: Checkbox label for saving session cookie
starlight-form-cookie-explanation: Explanation of what the cookie does
starlight-stale-tooltip:
Tooltip for stale badge. Parameters:
* $1 - age in days
starlight-verify-unverified: Status for reviews with no verification votes
starlight-verify-pending: Status for reviews that have verification votes but not enough to determine accuracy
starlight-verify-accurate: Status for highly verified accurate reviews
starlight-verify-mixed: Status for reviews with mixed verification
starlight-verify-count:
Shows verification vote count. Parameters:
* $1 - number of votes
starlight-verify-btn-true: Button to verify as completely true
starlight-verify-btn-mostly-true: Button to verify as mostly true
starlight-verify-btn-mixed: Button to verify as mixed accuracy
starlight-verify-btn-mostly-false: Button to verify as mostly false
starlight-verify-btn-false: Button to verify as completely false
starlight-error-invalid-rating: Error when rating is out of range
starlight-error-name-too-long:
Error when name exceeds limit. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum length
starlight-error-experience-too-long:
Error when experience exceeds limit. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum length
starlight-error-text-required: Error when review text is required but empty
starlight-error-text-too-short:
Error when review text is too short. Parameters:
* $1 - minimum length
starlight-error-text-too-long:
Error when review text exceeds limit. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum length
starlight-error-anonymous-disabled: Error when anonymous reviews are disabled
starlight-error-rate-limited: Error when user is rate limited
starlight-error-cannot-edit: Error when user can't edit review
starlight-error-cannot-delete: Error when user can't delete review
starlight-error-no-changes: Error when edit has no changes
starlight-error-cannot-verify: Error when user can't verify review
starlight-error-cannot-flag-own: Error when trying to flag own review
